median_read_pass_rate.long_name: Median percentage of 3rd graders passing reading test
median_read_pass_rate.short_description: Median percentage of 3rd grade population passing reading test for schools in the region
median_read_pass_rate.long_description: Median percentage of 3rd grade population passing reading test. The median is calculated across schools in the region.
median_read_pass_rate.statement: On average, {value} of 3rd graders pass reading in {region_name}.

sources.name: Virginia Department of Education
sources.location: Data & Reports > Statistics & Reports > SOL Test Pass Rates & Other Results

mean_read_pass_rate.long_description: Mean percentage of 3rd grade population passing reading test. The median is calculated across schools in the region.
mean_read_pass_rate.statement: In most regions, {value} of 3rd graders pass reading in {region_name}.
